title: Porcelain Partner
content:
I've been looking (and looking...) for a partner for Eduardo Recife's [Porcelain](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018075149/http:/www.misprintedtype.com/), used as follows:   
   
 ![Porcelain Sample](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018075149im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/4100/28612.jpg)   
   
I've been thinking of a distressed / weathered serif face. Any suggestions or other comments?
author: anonymous

comments.content: Jeff, I think that this combo looks very elegant. Porcelain is such a wildly versatile typeface. It can be nasty or elegant.
